subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The two-time Tour de France runner-up Andy Schleck and his Saxo Bank teammate Stuart O’Grady were sent home from the Vuelta a España after breaking team rules on drinking.
snippet: The two-time Tour de France runner-up Andy Schleck and his Saxo Bank teammate Stuart O’Grady were sent home from the Vuelta a España after breaking team rules on drinking.
